question: Which of the following statements is true regarding Flow logs?

answers.A: Adding a new instance in a subnet(flow log enabled) will automatically starts collecting the flow logs for newly created network interfaces
answers.B: You can create a flow log for a VPC, a subnet, or a network interface
answers.C: Deleting a flow log will delete any existing flow log records or log streams for CloudWatch
answers.D: You can create a flow log for Elastic Load Balancing and Amazon RDS
answers.E: Deleting a flow log disables the flow log service for the resource and it does not delete any existing flow log records or log streams
